dialogue: Good afternoon, this is Rachel calling from FinTrust Services. This call is recorded for quality and training purposes.
speaker: spk1

dialogue: May I have your full name and registered mobile number to verify your identity?
speaker: spk1

dialogue: Sure, I'm Kevin Roy, and my number is 9988776655.
speaker: spk2

dialogue: Thank you, Kevin. I see you have an overdue payment of ₹10,000 on your credit card ending with 7890, due on April 5th, including ₹9,500 principal and ₹500 in late fees.
speaker: spk1

dialogue: Yeah, I know I’m behind. I’ve been having some financial issues, and I can’t pay the full amount right now.
speaker: spk2

dialogue: I understand, Kevin. We can explore some options. Would you be able to make a partial payment to settle part of the debt?
speaker: spk1

dialogue: I could probably manage ₹4,000 this month. Would that work to settle part of it?
speaker: spk2

dialogue: Thank you for the offer. I can propose a partial settlement of ₹4,000, which would reduce your outstanding balance. The remaining ₹6,000 would need a payment plan. Does that sound acceptable?
speaker: spk1

dialogue: Yeah, I can do ₹4,000 now and work on the rest later. Let’s go with that.
speaker: spk2

dialogue: Great, I’ll note the partial settlement of ₹4,000. You can make the payment online, and we’ll follow up next month for the remaining balance. Anything else I can assist with?
speaker: spk1

dialogue: No, that’s it. Thanks for working with me.
speaker: spk2

dialogue: You’re welcome, Kevin. Thank you for your time. Have a great day. Goodbye.
